name: Talk with me
description:
Talk to me, is a short simulation game that deals with the anxiety that society can feel in certain situations and how to deal with it with a basic technique, controlling your breathing. For this, you will find yourself living a situation of social anxiety, which you must face with a method of relaxation through breathing.

 “If you always do what you've always done, you'll always get what you've always got.” – Steven Hayes
